## calibrationQRCodesScan() function

Scans an image containing a calibration image (which can be generated by [calibrationQRCodesGenerate()](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesgenerate.md)<!-- -->) and returns its position and the position of the QR code that was successfully scanned.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function calibrationQRCodesScan(image: PNG, config?: CalibrationQRCodesConfig): CalibrationQRCodesScanResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  image | PNG | full image containing a calibration image |
|  config | [CalibrationQRCodesConfig](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesconfig.md) | configuration used when generating the calibration image |

<b>Returns:</b>

[CalibrationQRCodesScanResult](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesscanresult.md)

the position of the calibration image inside the full image, and the position and size of the QR code that was successfully scanned.
